title: I WAS DCED FROM NA SERVERS JUST NOW AND IT WON'T LET ME BACK IN AND MY INTERNET IS FINE!!!! HELP !!!
body: my game dced me and my internet is fine checked everything

replies.body: Are you still experiencing issues connecting to matches or have your issues subsided? Just let me know! ^.^
it resolved it self  and hasn't happen since but thank you.

Calm your caps. If your internet suddenly stops and you get disconnected from your game, and when your internet is back up but you can't get back into the game, you should just ALT+F4 the game and it should return you to the Reconnect screen and you can reconnect that way.
